div.p: This variable is a recoded version of the discharge status code (variable called PTNTDSCHRGSTUSCD). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/nchptntstusind_cd

description.value: This variable is a recoded version of the discharge status code (variable called PTNT_DSCHRG_STUS_CD). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/nch_ptnt_stus_ind_cd
